commit.message: Add support for .yml files located in work dir or in classpath

nodes.bodyText: Why serial runner, is there a reason why these tests can't be run in parallel?
Bit weird for the tearDown() method to be annotated with @Before... Mistake?
Name is quite a mouthful, maybe something shorter?
Same question, can't you run them in parallel?
